scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:web && npm run typecheck:server
scripts.test:integration: bash -lc 'export DATABASE_URL=${DATABASE_URL:-postgresql://rp2_app:rp2_app@localhost:5432/revenuepilot}; export DATABASE_ADMIN_URL=${DATABASE_ADMIN_URL:-postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/revenuepilot}; export RP2_RUN_INTEGRATION=1; export RP2_OFFLINE_AI=1; export TRANSCRIPTION_PROVIDER=${TRANSCRIPTION_PROVIDER:-offlineMock}; export JWT_SECRET=${JWT_SECRET:-integration-jwt-secret-1234567890}; export CORS_ORIGIN=${CORS_ORIGIN:-http://localhost:5173}; export STORAGE_DIR=${STORAGE_DIR:-./server/storage}; export ALLOW_DEV_LOGIN=${ALLOW_DEV_LOGIN:-true}; npm run test:server'
scripts.test:soak: bash -lc 'export DATABASE_URL=${DATABASE_URL:-postgresql://rp2_app:rp2_app@localhost:5432/revenuepilot}; export DATABASE_ADMIN_URL=${DATABASE_ADMIN_URL:-postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/revenuepilot}; export RP2_RUN_INTEGRATION=1; export RP2_RUN_SOAK=1; export RP2_OFFLINE_AI=1; export TRANSCRIPTION_PROVIDER=${TRANSCRIPTION_PROVIDER:-offlineMock}; export JWT_SECRET=${JWT_SECRET:-integration-jwt-secret-1234567890}; export CORS_ORIGIN=${CORS_ORIGIN:-http://localhost:5173}; export STORAGE_DIR=${STORAGE_DIR:-./server/storage}; export ALLOW_DEV_LOGIN=${ALLOW_DEV_LOGIN:-true}; npm run test:server'
scripts.test:integration:prepare: bash -lc 'export DATABASE_ADMIN_URL=${DATABASE_ADMIN_URL:-postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/revenuepilot}; export DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_ADMIN_URL; npm --workspace @revenuepilot/server run prisma:generate && npm --workspace @revenuepilot/server run prisma:migrate:deploy && node ./scripts/bootstrap_rls_app_role.mjs'
